item.title: Get Ramadan Ready
item.dc:creator: Muslim Relief Worldwide
item.description:
Preparing your mind, body and soul. 5 workshops across the UK consisting of motivational talks, reminders and guidance. Sharing hints, tips, and spiritual blessings in preparation for the month of Ramadan, delivered by Asma Sheikh

The post Get Ramadan Ready appeared first on Muslim Relief Worldwide.
item.content:encoded:
Saturday 14th March to Sunday 29th March 2020 (6 dates)

Get Ramadan Ready

Prepare your mind, body and soul

A day of motivational talks, reminders and guidance. Sharing hints, tips, and spiritual blessings in preparation for the month of Ramadan.

Topics of Discussion

  • Sunnah foods to start consuming pre-Ramadan
  • Methods to strengthen your body before Ramadan
  • Nutritional facts on foods to eat and avoid during Ramadan
  • Islam and mental health
  • Emotional detox before Ramadan
  • Referencing our beloved sahabiyats in times of crisis
  • Signposting to local community networks

The cause

A clinic for the people. Muslim Relief Worldwide has begun work on a clinic providing free health care to thousands of impoverished families in Mansurpur, Jakiganj.

Yet the journey has only just begun. To make sure that we can provide lifesaving healthcare to those living in extreme hardship, £25,000 is needed every year to sustain the clinic.
With an ever-growing population and limited resources, Mansurpur is in desperate need of a medical clinic. The inhabitants of the village must travel miles for the nearest health complex and often cannot afford the treatment.

Muslim Relief Worldwide will provide free primary healthcare for everyone and save countless lives.

{%TICKETS_LIST%}





Donate towards our Shifa Clinic Appeal

Donate Now

The post Get Ramadan Ready appeared first on Muslim Relief Worldwide.

item.title: Come Iftar With Me
item.dc:creator: Muslim Relief Worldwide
item.description:
Join hundreds of people as they gather in homes, schools, offices, universities and mosques to host Iftars and help families living below the poverty line.

The post Come Iftar With Me appeared first on Muslim Relief Worldwide.
item.content:encoded:
Ramadan 2020

Come Iftar With Me

Event type
Host your own Iftar
Date
Throughout Ramadan 2020
Registration fee
FREE
Fundraising target
£150
Age suitability
For all ages (parental supervision for young children)
{%REGISTER_BTN%}

It’s time to #comeiftarwithme

Fancy yourself as a bit of a culinary expert? Now’s you chance to put your cooking to the test as you host an Iftar and raise vital funds to help families across the world.

By supporting Muslim Relief Worldwide this Ramadan, you will be giving hope to families in some of the poorest areas in the world. The money you raise can help families get the food that they desperately need.

The idea is simple. Host an Iftar for your family and friends this Ramadan and ask everyone to donate a small amount. With just 1 iftar, you can raise enough money to feed 5 families for an entire month.

The Come Iftar With Me pack

Each pack will contain the following:

  • Muslim Relief Worldwide branded apron
  • Cook book
  • Pack of fruit tree seeds
  • Bunting
  • Fridge magnets
  • Balloons
  • Ramadan benefits book
  • Dua book
  • Nasheed CD
  • Muslim Relief Worldwide t-shirt
  • Muslim Relief Worldwide brochure
  • Donation tub

Handy tips and ideas

Join hundreds of people as they gather in homes, schools, offices, universities, parks and mosques to host iftars and help feed hundreds of vulnerable families. Our lovely little pack will provide you with all the essentials to make your iftar the envy of all the land. Just follow these simple steps:

Invite everyone
Family, friends, neighbours, work colleagues – invite anyone that you can think of. You can call, text, tweet, DM, or snap, whatever method you use, make sure to spread the word. #comeiftarwithme
Get the look right
Our handy little Iftar pack contains all the essentials to make your Iftar look just right.
Cook up a storm
Use the recipe book provided to help you cook some delicious dishes from the countries in which Salam works.
Put the “fun” into fundraise
There’s lots of ways to raise money. You can charge for the dishes on iftar menu, you can sell mouth-watering cakes and sumptuous desserts, share your own JustGiving page and even get local restaurants and take-aways to donate a percentage of their earnings on a particular day.
Take lots of pictures
This is your chance to show everyone your amazing Iftar so make sure to take lots and lots of pictures and post on social media to encourage others to join the cause
.

The cause

Millions of people go hungry every night, not knowing when their next meal will come from. Salam is on the ground providing lifesaving food packs to refugees and families across the world.

Yemen has been devastated by war and famine, there is still no end in sight for the Syria conflict and thousands of Rohingya continue to flee into the overcrowded camps. These people need our help more than ever as acute malnutrition continues to devastate lives.

By supporting Muslim Relief Worldwide this Ramadan, you can help hundreds of families with our Feel Good Food projects in Yemen, Palestine, Syria, Bangladesh and Pakistan providing all the essentials for a balanced diet to feed a family for an entire month.

The post Come Iftar With Me appeared first on Muslim Relief Worldwide.

item.title: In Good Hands: An Introduction To The Art Of Henna
item.dc:creator: Muslim Relief Worldwide
item.description:
Tap into your creative side and learn the basic principles of applying henna. Acquire new skills as our experts in 6 different cities share their hints, tips and knowledge to get you started.

The post In Good Hands: An Introduction To The Art Of Henna appeared first on Muslim Relief Worldwide.
item.content:encoded:
16th February – 5th April 2020 (7 dates)

In Good Hands: An Introduction To The Art Of Henna

In Good Hands…

Tap into your creative side and learn the basic principles of applying henna. Acquire new skills as our experts in 6 different cities share their hints, tips and knowledge to get you started.

Get creative and join the fight against poverty.

The cause

Every day, poverty continues to rob people of their dignity. For millions of people, their only wish is to be able to lead themselves out of poverty and provide a future for their loved ones.

Millions of children are forced to spend hours every day collecting water from filthy rivers depriving them of the education that they so vitally need.

Muslim Relief Worldwide is on the ground building lifesaving water wells in some of the poorest areas in the world, providing sustainable drinking sources for generations to come.

{%TICKETS_LIST%}

The post In Good Hands: An Introduction To The Art Of Henna appeared first on Muslim Relief Worldwide.

item.title: An Evening With Ahmad Rubani
item.dc:creator: Muslim Relief Worldwide
item.description:
Join us for an epic evening with the one and only Ahmad Rubani. Beautiful nasheeds, auctions, meet and greet and much more!

The post An Evening With Ahmad Rubani appeared first on Muslim Relief Worldwide.
item.content:encoded:
Saturday 14th December 2019

An Evening With Ahmad Rubani

Event type
Fundraising concert
Date
Saturday 14th December 2019
Time
Doors open 6pm
Address
Digbeth Hall, 117 Canal Street, Birmingham, B5 5RA
Registration fee
£20
Parking
On Site parking available
Tickets
£20 per person
Age suitability
For all ages
{%REGISTER_BTN%}

An Evening with Ahmad Rubani

Ahmad Rubani has captured the imagination of the youth today with his soulful blend of classical nasheeds and vibrant melodies. Singing in Urdu and Punjabi, Ahmad has reached thousands with his unique style of nasheeds and naats mixed with an urban undertone creating a sound that is both blissful and entrancing.

Now is your chance to meet Ahmad in person as he joins us for an intimate gathering in Birmingham. He will answer questions from the audience and share personal stories but, most importantly, he will perform original tracks which are set to become instant classics.

The cause

The already overcrowded refugee camps in Lebanon have now become stretched to bursting point. The ongoing conflict in Syria continues to force thousands of people to flee their homes and get the relative safety of the camps, but now these camps simply cannot offer the safety that they so desperately seek.

Lebanon is facing one of the harshest winters in recent times and it is the vulnerable refugees who will suffer the most. With their few possessions, they are inadequately equipped to protect themselves and their families against the bitter cold.

Together we can make a difference. Book your tickets now and we can help Syrian and Palestinian refugees through the bitter winter.

The post An Evening With Ahmad Rubani appeared first on Muslim Relief Worldwide.

item.title: Echoes Of The Beloved
item.dc:creator: Muslim Relief Worldwide
item.description:
Join Mesut Kurtis, Ahmad Rubani, Muad and Qari Mohammed Talhah as they go on tour across the UK. Bringing a mix of spirituality and emotion, this charity dinner tour promises to be the highlight of the year.

The post Echoes Of The Beloved appeared first on Muslim Relief Worldwide.
item.content:encoded:
17th – 25th October 2019 (6 charity dinners)

Echoes Of The Beloved

6 venues across the UK and a 3 course dinner included in the price!

Join Mesut Kurtis, Ahmad Rubani, Muad and Qari Mohammed Talhah as they go on tour across the UK. Bringing a mix of spirituality and emotion, this tour promises to be the highlight of our year so far.

A three course dinner is included in the £15 ticket price and it’s for a great cause!

The cause

Madina Village is a community led initiative to provide housing, education and healthcare in one of the poorest areas of Sylhet. At the centre of the village will be a brand-new, state of the art, mosque and Islamic Academy to help our youngsters get the best possible education.

To ensure that the Madina villagers can lead themselves out of poverty, we will provide affordable housing to hundreds of people living on the poverty line and create sustainable working conditions to help them thrive.

{%TICKETS_LIST%}

The post Echoes Of The Beloved appeared first on Muslim Relief Worldwide.

item.title: National Volunteer Recruitment Drive
item.dc:creator: Muslim Relief Worldwide
item.description:
Join Muslim Relief Worldwide at any of the 15 venues and gain through the gift of giving. We'll show you what we do and how you can help people around the world.

The post National Volunteer Recruitment Drive appeared first on Muslim Relief Worldwide.
item.content:encoded:
19th – 27th August 2019 (15 dates)

National Volunteer Recruitment Drive

Volunteering means more than simply collecting donations

Volunteering for Muslim Relief Worldwide is a means for us to collectively extend our work and relieve hardship for thousands of people who live in poverty every day. Uniting and supporting through our time, energy, skills, networks, experiences and knowledge, kind hearted people are uniting to make a difference.

What’s taking place

At each venue we’ll be exploring the charity’s vision, going through post Ramadan feedback, overseas deployment opportunities, vacancies, brainstorming fundraising ideas, creating event and campaign concepts and of course meeting wonderful like-minded people.

Join Muslim Relief Worldwide at any of the 15 venues and gain through the gift of giving.

{%TICKETS_LIST%}

The post National Volunteer Recruitment Drive appeared first on Muslim Relief Worldwide.

item.title: My Ten Nights
item.dc:creator: Muslim Relief Worldwide
item.description:
With My Ten Nights, you can schedule your donations to spread them over the last ten days of Ramadan to make sure that you don’t miss the Night of Power.

The post My Ten Nights appeared first on Muslim Relief Worldwide.
item.content:encoded:
Ramadan 2020

My 10 Nights

What is My 10 Nights?

There is a night in Ramadan that is better than a thousand months. A night of rewards far beyond anything that we could imagine. Laylatul Qadr is a blessing from Allah and a way for us to purify ourselves through sadaqah and salah.

With My 10 Nights, you can schedule your donations to spread them over the last ten days of Ramadan to make sure that you don’t miss the Night of Power.

It’s hassle free and easy to set up, just follow these steps:

1) Launch My Ten Nights by clicking link below
2) Choose your cause
3) Schedule your donation

It’s as simple as that. You can split your donations equally or you can add more for the odd nights, the choice is yours.

LAUNCH MY TEN NIGHTS

You can now concentrate on your worship and remembrance of Allah safe in the knowledge that your donations are taken care of.

The post My Ten Nights appeared first on Muslim Relief Worldwide.

item.title: Instagram Live Appeal
item.dc:creator: Muslim Relief Worldwide
item.description:
Join Modest Street, Nadim Al-Maktari, Ezza Zahoor, Uzair Shafique, Chifa K and Ahmed Rubani for an evening of inspirational talks and fun filled challenges as we raise money to provide lifesaving food packs to desperate families this Ramadan.

The post Instagram Live Appeal appeared first on Muslim Relief Worldwide.
item.content:encoded:
Ramadan 2019

Instagram Live Appeal

Event type
Live appeal on instagram
Date
Sunday 26th May 2019
Time
5pm until 7pm
Fundraising target
£10,000
Age suitability
For all ages
Donate now

Be a positive influence…

Join Modest Street, Nadim Al-Maktari, Ezza Zahoor, Uzair Shafique, Chifa K and Ahmed Rubani for an evening of inspirational talks and fun filled challenges as we raise money to provide lifesaving food packs to desperate families this Ramadan.

In this unique fundraiser you can communicate directly with the influencers and donate to the cause on the night. It’ll be a 2 hour appeal with lots of information about the work Muslim Relief Worldwide is doing across the world.

There will be Ramadan tips and motivational talks, but most importantly it will be a live appeal to raise money to provide over 330 families with food to last an entire month.

The appeal will be taking place at instagram.com/salamcharityuk

See who’s taking part…

Modest Street

Nadim Al-Maktari

Ezza Zahoor

Uzair Shafique

Chifa K

Ahmad Rubani

The cause

Millions of people go hungry every night, not knowing when their next meal will come from. Muslim Relief Worldwide is on the ground providing lifesaving food packs to refugees and families across the world.

Yemen has been devastated by war and famine, there is still no end in sight for the Syria conflict and thousands of Rohingya continue to flee into the overcrowded camps. These people need our help more than ever as acute malnutrition continues to devastate lives.

By supporting Muslim Relief Worldwide this Ramadan, you can help hundreds of families with our Feel Good Food Appeal in Yemen, Palestine, Syria, Bangladesh and Pakistan providing all the essentials for a balanced diet to feed a family for an entire month.

The post Instagram Live Appeal appeared first on Muslim Relief Worldwide.

item.title: Come Iftar With Me

Join hundreds of people as they gather in homes, schools, offices, universities and mosques to host Iftars and help families living below the poverty line.

item.content:encoded:
Ramadan 2019

Come Iftar With Me

Event type
Host your own Iftar plus live cooking with our influencers
Date
Throughout Ramadan 2019
Registration fee
FREE
Fundraising target
£150
Age suitability
For all ages (parental supervision for young children)
{%REGISTER_BTN%}

It’s time to #comeiftarwithme

Fancy yourself as a bit of a culinary expert? Now’s your chance to put your cooking skills to the test as you join the growing number of social media influencers who have already signed up to host an Iftar and raise vital funds to help families across the world.

These influencers have signed up to host an iftar!

Eating With Alfina

Ezza Zahoor

Fizzah

Foodies By Fate

Halal Hangouts

Irem

Kitchen Diaries by Zubda

Lily K

Mariyam

Petal’s Kitchen

Rahima Eatally

Shakie

The Come Iftar With Me pack

Each pack will contain the following:

  • Apron
  • Recipe book
  • Bunting
  • Campaign literature
  • Balloons
  • Muslim Relief Worldwide T-shirt
  • Pack of fruit tree seeds
  • Fridge magnet
  • Bookmark
  • Dua CD
  • Dates

Handy tips and ideas

Invite everyone
Family, friends, neighbours, work colleagues – invite anyone that you can think of. You can call, text, tweet, DM, or Snap, whatever method you use, make sure to spread the word. #comeiftarwithme
Get the look right
Our handy little Iftar pack contains all the essentials to make your Iftar look just right.
Shake those buckets
There’s lots of ways to raise money. You can charge for the dishes on Iftar menu, you can sell mouth-watering cakes and sumptuous desserts. Don’t forget to send your donations after the event.
Cook up a storm
Use the recipe book provided to help you cook some delicious dishes from around the world.
Take lots of pictures
This is your chance to show everyone your amazing Iftar so make sure to take lots and lots of pictures and post on social media to encourage others to join the cause
.

The cause

Millions of people go hungry every night, not knowing when their next meal will come from. Salam is on the ground providing lifesaving food packs to refugees and families across the world.

Yemen has been devastated by war and famine, there is still no end in sight for the Syria conflict and thousands of Rohingya continue to flee into the overcrowded camps. These people need our help more than ever as acute malnutrition continues to devastate lives.

By supporting Muslim Relief Worldwide this Ramadan, you can help hundreds of families with our Feel Good Food projects in Yemen, Palestine, Syria, Bangladesh and Pakistan providing all the essentials for a balanced diet to feed a family for an entire month.

item.title: Salam Ramadan
item.dc:creator: Muslim Relief Worldwide
item.description:
A day of motivational talks, reminders and guidance in preparation for Ramadan.

The post Salam Ramadan appeared first on Muslim Relief Worldwide.
item.content:encoded:
19, 20 & 21st April 2019

Salam Ramadan

Prepare your mind, body and soul

Get ready for Ramadan with Aisha and Asma from Fit Lounge who will drop in to share their extraordinary life journey, sharing inspirational life hacks along the way.

A day full of reminders, guidance and motivational talks will refresh your mind, body and soul in preparation for this blessed month of Ramadan.

Don’t forget to try out Fit Lounges amazing skincare and nutrition range packed full of natural sunnah ingredients to keep you glowing this Ramadan.

Refreshments included.

Topics of Discussion

  • Prioritising ibadah over cooking
  • Knowing the importance of eating well
  • How fasting boosts health and fitness
  • Fasting is not starvation, rather a natural detox
  • Emotional detox during Ramadan
  • Healthy Ramadan is a happy Ramadan

The cause

Millions of people go hungry every single day, that’s why we are working tirelessly to provide lifesaving food for entire families in Yemen, Bangladesh, Syria and Kashmir.

Bradford
Friday 19th April 2019
5.00 – 9.30pm
The Great Victoria Hotel
Bridge Street
Bradford BD1 1JXN

View Map
Fee: £5
Refreshments included
Age suitability: 14+

(70 spaces £3.50 all day)
